citations.narrative:
The pond for the 11 ducks contains accumulations of suspended algae, leaves, branches, and other organic matter.
According to the facility representative, the caretaker for the pond has been ill for the last couple days so the leaves and
branches have not been removed daily from the surface. Excessive nutrients from runoff and decaying organic matter are
a main cause of algal blooms. Some algae such as blue-green algae can affect the health of animals.
Particulate matter must be removed from the pond as often as necessary to maintain the water quality. Licensee must
maintain a program to remove organic mater and debris from the pond so that the water quality is safe for the ducks.
Correct by November 16, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.157(a) 
   
Water quality. 
The pond for the 11 ducks contains accumulations of suspended algae, leaves, branches, and other organic matter. 
According to the facility representative, the caretaker for the pond has been ill for the last couple days so the leaves and 
branches have not been removed daily from the surface. Excessive nutrients from runoff and decaying organic matter are 
a main cause of algal blooms. Some algae such as blue-green algae can affect the health of animals.  
 
Particulate matter must be removed from the pond as often as necessary to maintain the water quality. Licensee must 
maintain a program to remove organic mater and debris from the pond so that the water quality is safe for the ducks. 
Correct by November 16, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
